dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the group and avoid drawing too much attention to myself. Perhaps I'll make some casual small talk or express neutral opinions during our discussions.

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: Based on Alice's statement, I would ask, "Alice, have you noticed any unusual behavior or suspicious actions from Charlie or myself today?" This question could potentially reveal any information Alice may have about the assassin's identity.
